text: Firefox shows me there's some kind of Facebook tracking running on the Julia Discourse. Due to it being blocked, I don't actually know what it is. Whatever it is, is it really needed or could it be disabled? The privacy policy does not mention it unfortunately.

text:
Could it just be that you use FB and it is therefor tracking you everywhere? 

Have you tried other sites or is it just the Julia discourse triggering this?
